title: Looking for a few more T207 catchers
author: Vintagecatcher

posts.post_title: Looking for a few more T207 catchers
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to add a few more T207 catchers:

Prefer creaseless examples. Nice fronts..backs can have issues.

Looking for the following:

John Henry
William Kelly
Ivey Wingo


Thanks,

Patrick

Ron,

I sent a response email. Enjoying the blizzard here in Maine!


Patrick

posts.post_title: Still searching for these three T207s
posts.post_content:
I'm still searching for these three T207s. 

Will pay strong of nice condition examples. 

Please send front and back scans as well as asking price.

Thanks,

Patrick
